title: Faction
description: A faction in the LANCER Bloodmoney Merc Board system

jobsCompletedOffset.description: Integer offset for completed job count

jobsFailedOffset.description: Integer offset for failed job count

notes: Faction job counts are dynamically calculated from job states using helper functions:
- calculateFactionJobCounts(factionId, jobs) - counts Complete/Failed jobs by faction
- enrichFactionWithJobCounts(faction, jobs) - adds calculated totals (count + offset) to faction object
Legacy fields jobsCompleted/jobsFailed are automatically migrated to offset fields on startup
